title: Lawful Money Held, National Banks, Other Than Central Reserve Cities for United States
notes:
Data Are Computed By NBER From "Specie" Plus "Legal Tender Notes" Plus "U.S. Certificates Of Deposit" Whenever Itemized Separately. Data Exclude Chicago And St. Louis. Monthly Coverage Varies From Year To Year. All Years Have Scattered Five Month Coverage, Except For 1882 Which Has Coverage Only For October And December. Source: Annual Reports Of The Comptroller Of The Currency.

This NBER data series m14012 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14012
